title: Improve WP Dev Center Financial Summary
body: When a payment is being processed, my "proceeds since last payment" drops by the amount I'm going to be paid. However I don't know how long the money will arrive in my account.

comments.body: If WP store is anything like W store, payments tend to arrive around the 15th of the month, sometimes the 14th sometimes the 16th but always about then.  The amount iis based on what is available (meaning sitting for 30 days in account) as of around the 1st of that month.
